defaultData.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for Retail Culinary System

description.context: The integration of Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) for admin and super admin roles in the Retail Culinary system is crucial for enhancing security and protecting sensitive data. This feature will provide an additional layer of security, ensuring that only authorized individuals can access the system. By implementing 2FA via SMS, the system will significantly reduce the risk of unauthorized access, thereby safeguarding the integrity of the data and maintaining user trust.
information: The 2FA system will utilize SMS as the primary method for sending verification codes to admins and super admins.
The implementation should be simple, user-friendly, and integrate seamlessly with the existing authentication system.
The 2FA setup process should be accessible and manageable by the admins themselves.
Error handling and logging mechanisms must be implemented to track any issues that arise during the 2FA setup or verification process.
The system must validate user input to prevent potential security vulnerabilities, such as SQL injection or cross-site scripting (XSS).
The solution should adhere to industry standards and best practices for security and authentication.
taskPoints: Research and select a suitable SMS gateway service for sending verification codes, considering factors such as cost, reliability, and ease of integration.
Design and implement the 2FA setup process for admins and super admins, ensuring a user-friendly interface and clear instructions for setup and usage.
Develop the necessary APIs or endpoints for integrating the SMS gateway service with the existing authentication system.
Implement the logic for generating and sending verification codes via SMS, including handling cases where the user does not receive the code or enters an incorrect code.
Integrate the 2FA verification process with the existing login system, ensuring that users are redirected to the 2FA verification page after successful username and password authentication.
Develop a mechanism for admins and super admins to reset their 2FA settings in case they lose access to their verified phone number or experience issues with the 2FA process.
Implement robust error handling and logging mechanisms to track and resolve issues related to the 2FA setup or verification process.
Conduct thorough testing of the 2FA system to ensure its stability, security, and usability.
Document the 2FA setup and usage process for admins and super admins, including troubleshooting guides for common issues.
Collaborate with the development team to ensure the 2FA system is properly integrated with the existing codebase and follows industry best practices for security and authentication.
deliverables: A fully functional 2FA system integrated with the existing authentication system.
A detailed document outlining the 2FA setup and usage process for admins and super admins.
A technical report on the selected SMS gateway service and its integration with the system.
A testing report confirming the stability, security, and usability of the 2FA system.
A troubleshooting guide for common 2FA-related issues.
A code review report ensuring the 2FA system adheres to industry standards and best practices for security and authentication.
